choices.B: Adding certificates and certificate issuers as resource types in Kubernetes clusters
choices.D: Generating certificates only by connecting to external services
choices.C: Routing requests based on HTTP headers
choices.A: Scanning container images stored in Harbor

questions.question_text: Which use case can be satisfied by cert-manager?

discussion.content: D. Collects and analyzes traces, metrics, and logs to provide single source of truth for actionable insights.

questions.question_text: What statement describes the role of VMware Aria Operations for Applications (formerly VMware Tanzu Observability) in VMware Tanzu for Kubernetes Operations?

choices.C: Tracks metrics, logs, and alerts based on specified thresholds.
choices.B: Automates the remediation of Kubernetes platform resources based on collected data.
choices.A: Watches defined infrastructure systems to keep track of health of resources.
choices.D: Collects and analyzes traces, metrics, and logs to provide single source of truth for actionable insights.
